description.value: You're skilled at running digital fraud schemes. You can Create a Forgery using [[/act create-forgery skill=computers]]{Computers} instead of Society. Digital forgeries are compared against your Computers DC. Using information gained from a successful forgery usually requires additional checks, including Deception and Society, and casting too wide a net runs the risk of a potential victim figuring out your ruse and turning you in to the authorities.
